**Hello**,

Thanks for opening an app request! Please ensure you have read the [app criteria](https://github.com/ImranR98/apps.obtainium.imranr.dev/blob/main/APP_CRITERIA.md) to confirm that the app you are requesting is suitable for this site. If you havenâ€™t done so already, give it a read now.

If you realise the app you want is not suitable, please close the discussion.

If you choose to leave a request for an unsuitable app open, it may be ignored.
